text: Golden Eagle Award () is a Russian national award for movies and TV series, run by the Russian Academy of Cinema Arts since 2002. It like the Academy Awards and gives out in 20 nominations each January. The ceremony is held at the Mosfilm studios, where some of the most acclaimed Soviet features were filmed. ==Other websites== * Category:2000s establishments in Russia Category:2002 establishments Category:Movie awards Category:Television Category:Russian culture
title: Golden Eagle Award
